   PORT(

      rst_n       : IN     std_logic;

      alien_col   : OUT    std_logic_vector (23 DOWNTO 0);
      x_coord     : OUT    std_logic_vector (7 DOWNTO 0);
      y_coord     : OUT    std_logic_vector (7 DOWNTO 0)
